snippet: The Texas Rangers pitcher Neftali Feliz needs Tommy John surgery on his right elbow. He is expected to return next summer.
abstract: MLB Roundup; Texas Rangers pitcher Neftali Feliz will undergo Tommy John surgery to repair a tear in his right elbow, likely sidelining him until next summer; MLB results noted.
lead_paragraph: The Texas Rangers pitcher Neftali Feliz needs Tommy John surgery on his right elbow. He is expected to return next summer.

headline.seo: Texas Rangers’ Feliz to Undergo Tommy John Surgery
headline.main: Feliz to Miss Rest of Year for Surgery on Elbow
headline.print_headline: Feliz to Miss Rest of Year For Surgery On Elbow
